DOC.brief_summary: This study assess bioequivalence lesinurad tablet manufacture two different site .
DOC.detailed_description: This study intend evaluate clinical comparability lesinurad tablet manufacture 2 different site assess relevant clinical Pharmacokinetics ( PK ) parameter .
DOC.criteria: Subject body weight ≥ 50 kg ( 110 lb . ) body mass index ≥ 18 ≤ 40 kg/m2 . Subject Screening serum urate level ≤ 7 mg/dL . ˗ Subject free clinically significant disease medical condition , per Investigator 's judgment . Subject gastrointestinal disorder affect motility and/or absorption . Subject history suspicion kidney stone . Subject undergone major surgery within 3 month prior Screening . Subject donate blood experienced significant blood loss ( > 450 mL ) within 12 week prior Day 1 give plasma donation within 4 week prior Screening visit . Subject inadequate venous access unsuitable vein repeat venipuncture .
